Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Candy Land
programme.desc: Five teams of professional cake makers compete in a series of testing challenges, with the winning team taking home a whopping $25,000. Each team is challenged to create a stunning, edible showpiece, but they are also given further instructions as the show progresses. They must use all of their artistry, flair and baking talent to have any chance of impressing the judges and taking home the winnings.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Summer Baking Championship
programme.desc: Jesse Palmer challenges the bakers to cook up sweet and savoury breakfast treats and turn lakeside berries into mile-high summer pies.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Outchefd

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Seafood Smackdown. Its a coastal competition when Eddie Jackson stuns home cook Chelsea Gieselmann with a seafood showdown against Chef Alex Guarnaschelli.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + CUT Steakhouse. At Wolfgang Pucks gorgeous CUT steakhouse, Selena Gomez takes on two initiation tests before creating her own spicy seafood dish.

programme.title: Best Baker in America

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: In the final, the teams make alien invasion cakes. Next, 50 cake fans decide which of the six winning cakes will take home the $40,000 grand prize.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Meklēšana
programme.desc: Kad pazūd Deivida Kima 16 gadus vecā meita, viņš pirmoreiz dzīvē iedziļinās meitas sociālo tīklu pasaulē, kura atklāj daudz vairāk, nekā sākotnēji šķita... Filma uzdod tiešus un neērtus jautājums, kas attiecināmu uz ikvienu, – cik daudz no sevis mēs mūsdienās uzticam sociālajiem tīkliem? Ko tie par mums stāsta, un kā ar mums ir iespējams manipulēt?

programme.title: Izbrauciens
programme.desc: Bens Bārbers (Kevins Hārts) gatavojas precēties ar saderināto Andželu (Tika Samptere), kura ir viņa policijas partnera Džeimsa (Aiss Kjūbs) māsa. Policistus nosūta uzdevumā uz Maiami, lai izmeklētu nežēlīgā narkotiku tirgoņa Antonio Poupa (Bendžamins Brats) nodarījumus, par kuru ir zināms, ka tas apgādā visu Maiami ar narkotikām. Viņi apvienojas ar bezkompromisu detektīvi Maju (Olīvija Manna) un dodas pārtraukt Poupa darbību. Spriedze palielinās, tuvojoties Bena un Andželas kāzām.

programme.title: Tikai drosmīgie
programme.desc: Uz patiesiem notikumiem balstīts stāsts par kādu ugunsdzēsēju vienību, kas ar savu varonību, apņēmību un spēju upurēties kļūst par vienu labākajām ugunsdzēsēju vienībām ASV. Kamēr vairums ļaužu izvairās no briesmām, viņi dodas tām pretī, sargājot citu cilvēku dzīvību, mājas un visu, kas tiem dārgs. Viņi kļūst kā brāļi, un tam ir īpaša nozīme, kad nākas stāties pretī kādam liktenīgam ugunsgrēkam. 2013. gada vasara. Arizonas štatā plosās postoši ugunsgrēki, un glābēju grupa dodas tos novērst. Aktieru vidū ir gan "Oskaram" nominētais Džošs Brolins, gan "Oskara" saņēmējs Džefs Bridžess.

programme.title: Manas lielās grieķu kāzas
programme.desc: Pēc ģimenes patriarha nāves Tula mēģina atrast sava tēva bērnības draugus Grieķijā, lai sarīkotu ģimenes atkalapvienošanos.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs – ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks: Ceļojums Zirnekļpasaulē
programme.desc: Fils Lords un Kristofers Millers, radošie prāti aiz "Lego filma" un "Džampstrīta 21", apvieno savus talantus un pieņem izaicinājumu – radīt unikālu skatījumu par komiksu pasaulē labi zināmo Zirnekļcilvēka visumu. Viņiem tas izdodas ar elpu aizraujošu stāstu un līdz šim neredzētu vizuālo noformējumu, pelnīti saņemot Oskaru par gada labāko animācijas filmu. "Zirnekļcilvēks. Ceļojums Zirnekļpasaulē" mūs iepazīstina ar jauno Maiklu Moralesu un vēl pieciem spilgtiem personāžiem no dažādām dimensijām, kuri apveltīti ar zirnekļ-supervaroņa spējām. Tikai darbojoties kopā, viņi var apturēt briesmas, kas apdraud visas realitātes.

programme.title: Auniņš Šons filma: Fermagedons
programme.desc: Netālu no auniņa Šona fermas ir avarējis piemīlīgās un draiskās citplanētietes Lu-Las kosmosa kuģis. Lu-Las neparasto spēju, nebeidzamo blēņu un galaktikas mēroga atraugu apburts, Šons nolemj palīdzēt savai jauniegūtajai draudzenei atgriezties mājās, nenojaušot, ka nežēlīga citplanētiešu mednieku organizācija jau dzen viņiem pēdas. Vai Šons un viņa bars spēs novērst Fermagedonu, pirms nav par vēlu?

programme.title: Krāpšanas ilūzija
programme.desc: Pagājis gads, kopš "Četriem jātniekiem" izdevās apvest ap stūri FIB. Viņi gaida ziņu no Acs – iluzionistu grupas, kura ir pieņēmusi viņus darbā. Daniels Atlass (Džese Aizenbergs) pats sāk savu izmeklēšanu, lai tos atrastu, kamēr nonāk līdz tehnoloģiju pavēlniekam Valteram Mebrijam (Daniels Redklifs), kurš "jātniekiem" uzdod nozagt datu iegūšanas ierīci. Pēc tam dzīve sagriežas virpulī, kurš ietekmē cilvēkus pagātnē, tagadnē un nākotnē.

programme.title: Girl You Know Its True: Milli Vanilli stāsts
programme.desc: Filmas centrā ir patiess stāsts par bēdīgi slaveno skandālu, kurā dejotāji Roberts Pilatuss un Fabriss Morvans kļuva slaveni astoņdesmito gadu beigās kā popmūzikas sensācija Milli Vanilli. Mūzikas producenta Frenka Fariana vadībā viņi kļuva par pasaules mēroga zvaigznēm, ar trim hitiem Nr. 1 ASV. Taču tikai neliels cilvēku loks zina, ka duets nevis dzied, bet sinhronizē lūpas ar divu citu mākslinieku balsīm. Savas slavas virsotnē Milli Vanilli iegūst Grammy balvu, taču, kad patiesība tiek atklāta, pasaule ir lieciniece vienam no lielākajiem skandāliem mūzikas vēsturē.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības
programme.desc: Bijušais ieslodzītais Doms Toreto ir atgriezies Losandželosā, lai noskaidrotu patiesību, kas slēpjas aiz kāda augsta līmeņa nozieguma, bet viņa ierašanās pilsētā neapmierina aģentu Braienu OKoneru (Volkers). Abi sāncenši ir spiesti apvienot spēkus, lai uzveiktu kopīgu ienaidnieku, vienlaikus izbaudot ātras braukšanas mākslas jaunas un satraucošas robežas.

programme.title: Džumandži: Laipni lūgti džungļos
programme.desc: Četri vidusskolēni atrod vecu spēļu konsoli ar līdz šim neredzētu videospēli džumandži. Viņi iesaistās šajā spēlē, kas norisinās džungļos, un iemiesojas pašu izraudzītajos avataros. Jaunieši apjauš, ka džumandži ir kas vairāk par spēli, tā ir cīņa par izdzīvošanu. Lai uzvarētu spēlē, viņiem jādodas bīstamākajā piedzīvojumā mūžā, jāatklāj Alana Periša pirms 20 gadiem atstātās pēdas un jāmaina priekšstats pašiem par sevi, pretējā gadījumā viņi paliks ieslēgti spēlē uz visiem laikiem...

programme.title: Sātans "Pradas" brunčos
programme.desc: Žilbinošajā Ņujorkas modes pasaulē žurnāls "Runway" ir tikpat kā Svētā Grāla statusā. To ar manikirētu dūri vada Miranda Prīstlija – ietekmīgākā sieviete modes nozarē. "Runway" ir biedinošs izaicinājums jebkuram, kas vēlas gūt panākumus šai jomā. Lai padarītu "Runway" par Ņujorkas un tātad arī visas pasaules modes bībeli, Miranda nekam neļauj stāties sev ceļā – ieskaitot neskaitāmas asistentes, kas atlaistas, jo nav atbildušas neaptveramajām prasībām. Neviens sevi cienošs cilvēks nespētu paciest šādu darbu, tomēr miljoniem jaunu sieviešu šādas izdevības dēļ būtu gatavas uz visu.

programme.title: Džeisons Borns
programme.desc: Bijusī CIP slepenā aģente Nikija Pārsone (Džūlija Stailza) reiz palīdzēja Bornam (Mets Deimons), pēc tam nozuda un šobrīd strādā kopā ar ziņotāju, kurš gatavojas nodot atklātībā CIP slepenās specoperācijas. Nikija ielaužas CIP sistēmā un lejupielādē visu, kas saistīts ar specoperācijām, tostarp operāciju "Dzirnakmens", kurā piedalījās Borns. CIP aģente Hetera Lī (Alīsija Vikandere) atklāj ielaušanos un par to ziņo CIP direktoram Robertam Dūvijam (Tomijs Lī Džonss), kurš ir specoperāciju galvenais vadītājs.

programme.title: Kurš pēc kārtas?
programme.desc: Pēc kārtējām izjukušajām attiecībām Alija nolemj neielaisties attiecībās ne ar vienu citu, bet gan uzmeklēt savus bijušos, lai noskaidrotu, kurš no tiem ir viņas dzīves īstais vīrietis.

programme.title: Mans spiegs
programme.desc: Rūdītais CIP aģents Džeidžejs tiek pazemināts amatā un nosūtīts misijā novērot deviņgadīgās Sofijas ģimeni. Kad meitene atrod dzīvoklī slepenās kameras, viņa izseko to signālam un atklāj novērošanas operāciju pārraudzības vietu. Solot nenodot atklātībai Džeidžeja aizsegu, Sofija pierunā aģentu veltīt viņai laiku un apmācīt spiegošanas prasmēs. Lai gan sākotnēji piedāvājums viņā raisa skepsi, Džeidžejs aptver, ka gudrībā un atjautībā ar Sofiju viņš mēroties nevar.

programme.title: Robota bērns
programme.desc: Kādu pusaugu meiteni pazemes bunkurā gādīgi uzaudzina robots "Māte", kura uzdevums ir atjaunot cilvēku populāciju pēc cilvēces izmiršanas globālā katastrofā. Tomēr meitenes un robota īpašā saikne tiek apdraudēta, kad viņu patvērumā nez no kurienes ierodas svešiniece ar satraucošām ziņām.

programme.title: Palaidnis
programme.desc: Kopš kucēna vecuma Palaidnis ir lutināts un dzīvojis greznībā plašā savrupnamā. Taču, kad viņa turīgā saimniece dodas mūžībā, Palaidnis paliek viens un nonāk uz ielas. Siltumnīcas apstākļos augušais suns ir galīgi nepiemērots dzīvei reālajā pasaulē, un, it kā ar to būtu par maz, viņu sāk vajāt saimnieces alkatīgie radinieki, kas ar Palaidņa starpniecību cer tikt pie iespaidīga mantojuma.

programme.title: Tuksneša prinči
programme.desc: Berberu puisēna un viņa drauga kamieļa piedzīvojumi, šķērsojot tuksnesi.

programme.title: My Little Pony. Filma
programme.desc: Kad ļauni spēki apdraud Ponijvilu, sešas ponijmeitenes pirmo reizi mūžā pamet dzimto zemi un dodas neaizmirstamā ceļojumā tālu aiz tās robežām. Meklējot palīdzību, viņas nonāks gan otrpus maģiskajiem kalniem, gan zemūdens pasaulē un pat lidojošā pirātu kuģī. Ponijmeitenes piedzīvos galvu reibinošas dēkas, iegūs jaunus draugus, iemācīsies likt lietā draudzības maģiju un varēs izglābt savas mājas.

programme.title: Mana dīvainā ģimenīte
programme.desc: Uz savas trīspadsmitās dzimšanas dienas sliekšņa Betija, topošā mūziķe un maģiska būtne, vienkārši vēlas būt tāda pati kā pārējā viņas burvīgā, bet pavisam atšķirīgā ģimene, tikai kādēļ māmiņa nav ar mieru? Taču Betija pavisam drīz uzzina brīnumaino patiesību par saviem tuviniekiem un atklāj, ka arī viņi ir neparasti – muzikāli un maģiski – apdāvināti.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Mēs atkal esam klāt
programme.desc: Pēc Donnas nāves Sofija gatavojas piepildīt mātes ilgi loloto sapni – atvērt viesnīcu. Tomēr gaidāmos svētkus aizēno domstarpības ar Skaju, kurš strādā Ņujorkā un pat nenojauš par... gaidāmo bērniņu! Kā Sofija tiks ar visu galā viena pati? Par laimi, palīgā nāk mammas draudzenes, kuras izstāsta Sofijai, ar kādu drosmi un pārliecību savulaik šai vietā jaunu dzīvi uzsāka viņas māte. Tālajā 1979. gadā jaunā Donna nupat kā bija absolvējusi universitāti un gatavojās ceļot pa pasauli. Parīzē viņa satika Hariju, kurš, par spīti savam naivumam, viņu spēja apburt. Vēlāk, nokavējusi prāmi uz Kalokairi, Donna iepazinās ar Bilu, kurš piedāvāja viņu aizvest. Un tad... Tad Donna sastapa Semu, kurā neprātīgi iemīlējās, taču viņš salauza Donnas sirdi, bet ne spēcīgo garu.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības 3: Tokijas sacīkstes
programme.desc: Šons Bosvels ir pārgalvīgs sacīkšu braucējs, kam ir saspīlētas attiecības ar policiju. Lai izvairītos no cietumsoda, viņu nosūta uz dzīvi pie skarbā, atsvešinātā tēva, kurš savas militārās karjeras ietvaros atrodas Tokijā. Dzīvei rodas jauna garša, kad kāds cits amerikānis, ar iesauku Tvinkijs, viņu iepazīstina ar driftinga sacīkšu slepeno pasauli. Jau pirmajā braucienā Šons nezinādams izaicina D. K. jeb "Driftinga karali", vietējo čempionu, kam ir sakari ar japāņu mafiju Jakudzu. Kad Šons iemīlas D. K. draudzenē, stāvoklis kļūst vēl jo bīstamāks...

programme.title: Smurfi
programme.desc: Palicis ar garu degunu, burvis Gargamelis turpina kaldināt plānus, kā sagrābt savos nagos Smurfu burvju esenci. Šoreiz viņš ar burvestību palīdzību rada divus jaunus Smurfus, taču to vara izrādās nekam nederīga. Tādēļ viņš nolaupa Smurfeti un aizved viņu uz Parīzi. Taču Smurfu ģimene, protams, nepametīs Smurfeti nelaimē un dodas uz Parīzi viņu glābt. Talkā nāk arī viņu draugi cilvēki Patriks un Greisa.

programme.title: Karalis Artūrs
programme.desc: Artūrs nevēlas kļūt par vadoni. Viņa vienīgā vēlme ir atstāt Lielbritāniju un atgriezties Romas mierīgajā un līdzsvarotajā dzīvē. Taču pirms tam viņam kopā ar Apaļā galda bruņiniekiem jādodas pēdējā uzdevumā. Top skaidrs, ka pēc Romas sairšanas Lielbritānijai vajadzēs karali, kas ne tikai aizsargās valsti pret nemitīgajiem sakšu iebrukumiem, bet arī iedibinās uz salas jaunu kārtību. Ar Merlina un daiļās, drosmīgās Ginevras atbalstu Artūram būs sevī jārod spēks, lai mainītu vēstures gaitu.

programme.title: Modiljāni. Trīs dienas uz neprāta spārniem
programme.desc: Pirmā pasaules kara laikā Parīzē bohēmiskais mākslinieks Modiljāni cenšas izvairīties no bumbām, policistiem, draudzenēm un kritiķiem, pieaugošā izmisumā meklējot mājas savai mākslai.

programme.title: Venoms
programme.desc: Reportiera Edija Broka pētījumu lokā ir tēmas, uz ko valdība piever acis. Veicot žurnālistisko izmeklēšanu, Broks nejauši nonāk kontaktā ar ārpuszemes simbiotu, kas pārņem viņa ķermeni. Savienojumā ar simbiotu Broks iegūst superspējas un kļūst par fascinējošo varoni Venomu. Nu viņam jāsadarbojas ar šo parazītisko dzīvības formu ķermenī, lai izglābtu savu dzīvību.

programme.title: Draiskule
programme.desc: Kopš bērnības Eimijas brunčumednieks tēvs ir pārliecinājis viņu, ka monogāmija nav iespējama. Tagad Eimija strādā žurnāla redakcijā un dzīvo ar šādu pārliecību, baudot dzīvi, kas ir brīva no smacējošām, garlaicīgām romantiskajām saistībām, tomēr patiesībā viņa ir iegrimusi rutīnā. Reiz Eimija secina, ka sāk iemīlēties sava jaunā raksta varonī – apburošajā un veiksmīgajā sporta ārstā Āronā Konersā. Tas liek sievietei prātot, vai citi pieaugušie, tostarp šis puisis, kuram ir patiesas simpātijas pret Eimiju, varētu pārliecināt viņu mainīt dzīves filozofiju.

programme.title: Millera meitene
programme.desc: Gotu stila Tenesijas vidusskolas pēdējā kursa skolniece un rakstniece Kairo studē literatūru pie Džonatana Millera, rakstnieka, kurš pievērsās mācīšanai, kad viņa romāni neguva panākumus. Kā grāmatu tārps viņa jau bija izlasījusi viņa uzdoto literatūru, atstājot uz viņu iespaidu. Viņš kļūst par viņas mentoru, un viņi pavada laiku kopā ārpus skolas, apmeklējot rakstīšanas pasākumus. Kairo labākā draudzene lesbiete, kura smejas par flirtēšanu ar skolas treneri, lai iegūtu to, ko vēlas, pārliecina viņu izmantot savu rakstīšanu, lai pavedinātu jau precēto Milleru. Kad Millers uzdod viņai starpposma uzdevumu agrāk nekā citiem, viņa izmanto šo uzdevumu, lai izpaustu savas iekšējās vēlmes par viņu uz papīra, iesaistot abus pretrunīgā situācijā.

programme.title: Teorija par visu
programme.desc: 20. gadsimta 60. gados Kembridžas Universitātes students un topošais fiziķis Stīvens Hokings iemīlas savā studiju biedrē Džeinā Vaildā. Kad Hokingam ir 21 gads, viņam konstatē motorā neirona slimību. Par spīti tam un ar Džeinas palīdzību viņš uzsāk ambiciozu laika izpētes projektu, lai gan puiša ārsts apgalvo, ka laika viņam ir atlicis ļoti maz. Spītējot nelaimei, Stīvens un Džeina izdara jaunus atklājumus medicīnā un zinātnē, sasniedzot vairāk, nekā abi bija spējuši iedomāties.

programme.title: Playmobil. Filma
programme.desc: Animācijas filmas radītājus iedvesmojušas Playmobil rotaļlietas.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības
programme.desc: Šajā aizraujošajā spriedzes filmā Vina Dīzela un Pola Volkera varoņi no jauna tiekas ar iepriekšējo filmu zvaigznēm. No policijas bēgošais Doms Toreto (Dīzels) Brazīlijā uzmeklē bijušo policistu Braienu OKoneru (Volkers), un abi kļūst par partneriem. Viņiem pa pēdām seko ASV specvienība bīstamā aģenta Feda (Dveins Džonsons) vadībā, kā arī vairāki pērkami policisti, kas strādā nežēlīga narkodīlera uzdevumā. Lai iegūtu brīvību un mierīgu dzīvi, komandai jāpaveic vēl pēdējais uzdevums – jānolaupa 100 miljoni dolāru.

programme.title: Mednieks un ledus karaliene
programme.desc: Ļaunā Ravenna uzzina, ka viņas māsa karaliene Freija gaida mazuli un mīl kādu augstmani. Freija dzemdē meitenīti, bet viņas mīļākais nogalina mazuli un Freijas dusmas atbrīvo ledus spēku, kas nogalina mīļāko. Freija dodas uz ziemeļiem, lai uzbūvētu pili un izveidotu armiju, kura nozog bērnus un izaudzina tos par nežēlīgiem kareivjiem. Paiet gadi, un Ēriks un Sāra ir izauguši un iemīlējušies viens otrā. Viņi plāno aizbēgt no pils, bet Freija starp viņiem uzbūvē ledus sienu. Kādu dienu Sniegbaltīte saslimst, un viņas vīrs meklē Ēriku, lai pateiktu, ka burvju spogulis ir nozagts, kad tika vests uz patvērumu. Ēriks apvienojas ar diviem rūķīšiem, lai atrastu spoguli, taču viņu meklējumi ir saistīti ar briesmām.

programme.title: Dziedi!
programme.desc: Kad viņa teātrim draud slēgšana, uzņēmējdarbībā pieredzējušais koala Basters Mūns (Metjū Makkonahijs) sarīko dziesmu konkursu. Daudziem vietējiem zvēriem tas rada iespēju izpausties. Cūka Rosita (Rīza Viterspūna) ir māte un mājsaimniece, kura atteicās no pusaudža sapņa kļūt par dziedātāju. Pusaudze dzeloņcūka Eša (Skārleta Johansone) ir pancīga roķere alternatīvās mūzikas grupā. Gorillu Džoniju (Tārons Edžertons) viņa tēvs (Pīters Serafinovičs) grib pārliecināt pievērsties savam banku aplaupītāja arodam. Ikkatrs no šiem radījumiem vēlas piepildīt savu sapni un dziedāt no visas sirds!

programme.title: Futbols: Serie A. Cremonese - Sassuolo
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: Futbols: Serie A. Lecce - Milan
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Real Madrid - Mallorca
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Rayo Vallecano - Barcelona
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

UFC. Fight Night: Nassourdine Imavov vs Caio Borralho
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Living Aloha

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina restore an abandoned 1952 ranch home in West Covina, CA, with a vintage car theme to honour Southern Californias car culture boom of the 50s.

programme.title: Vintage Flip

programme.title: Fix My Flip
programme.desc: A couple taking on their first flip go overboard by gutting a quaint home and planning a large addition. When city permits stall the project, Page steps in.

programme.title: Tiny Luxury
programme.desc: Husband and wife Tyson and Michelle Spiess are founders of Tiny Heirloom, a unique building company focussing on the construction of tiny, luxury homes. In this reality series we follow them as they construct homes under 400 square feet (37 square metres) into glorious, high-end, miniature mansions, showing that downsizing doesnt have to compromise comfort and style. Based in Portland, Oregon, the family run company helps customers fulfill their real estate dreams, squeezing every wish and request into these tiny homes, allowing them to enjoy every aspect of their new, pint-sized properties.

programme.title: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The series premiere focuses on Anstead renovating her new home following her divorce with Tarek El Moussa, with whom they hosted Flip or Flop show. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

programme.title: Mini Reni

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: With her youngest child, Crew, moving to the big kids room, Joanna expands her kitchen into Crews old bedroom and creates the pantry of her dreams.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Bargain Block New Orleans
programme.desc: Keith and Evan aim to finish renovating the renters half of a dilapidated duplex, but their budget soon spirals out of control.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey and Chum are in San Francisco, California, hoping to find new treasures. Theyll check out some vintage Italian vehicles, pinball machines and a high-price San Francisco Giants collection.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: American Pickers is an American reality series that follows ingenious "pickers" Mike Wolfe, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value. programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: Groups of independent shippers compete with each other in this American reality series, as they bid for the right to haul unconventional items that many conventional carriers deem unfeasible to transport. The crews performances are scrutinised throughout, and their operational abilities are pushed to their limits as they transport both bizarre and tricky shipments across the country.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Chimpanzees are known to us as amusing circus attractions and are even popular as pets, but when they attack the results are frightening and horrific. Just as disturbing, across the US, witness reports suggest that chimpanzees may be on the loose.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: We go beneath the streets of Japan to see the latest technology that saves the city from the many natural disasters ready to strike. Head back in time to World War II to see how Hiroshimas underground offered protection from the most powerful bombs.

programme.desc: Chimpanzees are known to us as amusing circus attractions and are even popular as pets, but when they attack the results are frightening and horrific. Just as disturbing, across the US, witness reports suggest that chimpanzees may be on the loose.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: We go beneath the streets of Japan to see the latest technology that saves the city from the many natural disasters ready to strike. Head back in time to World War II to see how Hiroshimas underground offered protection from the most powerful bombs.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Ancient lore talks of a Canadian warrior tribe that once terrorised the Nahanni valley, decapitating their enemies. The tribe vanished many years ago, but missing person reports have coincided with eyewitness sightings of ancient soldiers.

programme.title: Dead Silent
programme.desc: This docu-series takes the viewer on a disturbing psychological journey into the dark and foreboding world of true crimes carried out in lonesome and desolate locations. From hikers hearing a twig snap in a remote forest, to a mysterious stranger disrupting a fishing trip at an isolated campsite, or a young couples desperate fight for survival at a secluded lovers lane, this series examines the terrifying reality of being alone in a life-threatening situation. Each episode focuses on one specific case and uses eyewitness accounts from survivors, expert analysis from criminologists and psychologists, and commentary from local authorities to provide context and authenticity to these truly horrifying tales.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: Documentary series following police officers across the USA as they put their lives on the line to enforce the law. Using real footage from the officers body cameras, we show just how deadly routine checks can be, with law enforcement officials having to think on their feet and make split-second decisions to potentially save their, or someone elses, life. From knife-wielding maniacs to brutal shootouts, the series highlights the importance of our police departments. With interviews from the officers involved adding context to the footage, Body Cam Cops gives viewers unprecedented, exclusive access to what life is truly like in the line of duty.

Watch the reenactments of real life gut-wrenching stories, from terrible double homicides to shocking kidnappings, and more.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: A true-life crime documentary series that blends dramatic re-enactments with interviews from family and friends of the crime victims along with commentary from law enforcment officers, legal professionals and criminal psychologists. Each 60 minute episode features a specific case where the darkest fears of victims become harrowing realities. Epsiodes include such tales as when Matthew Heikkila shoots his parents and then terrorizes his girlfriend; when a flight attendant breaks her own rule of traveling alone just once and pays the ultimate price; when 22-year-old college student Kari Swensen goes for a run in the Montana wilderness and is taken prisoner by two mountain men; and when recently divorced Tanya Petro goes missing after meeting a new man.

programme.desc: The American paranormal television series focuses on investigations by retired homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and psychic communicator Amy Allan. The two never communicate during investigation, they study the cases of crimes separately, and only coming to certain conclusions compare their results. Their methods of work are completely opposite: Steve uses common sense, documents, talks to real people, and Amy relies on her sixth sense and her ability to communicate with ghosts and spirits.

programme.title: Ghost Nation
programme.desc: Hair-rising American reality series that follows paranormal investigators Jason Hawes, Steve Gonsalves and Dave Tango, known from the Ghost Hunters television series, as they respond to calls from people who need their help with the cases of reportedly haunted locations around the United States. The guys are members of the paranormal investigation group- T.A.P.S., which Hawes founded, and they helped to create United Paranormal Research Organization (UPRO), which aims to be a global paranormal investigation organization that keeps local organizations connected. Using state-of-the-art technology, strict methodology and local contacts, the team tracks down the source of the unexplained phenomena and cracks each outrageous case.

programme.title: Destination Fear
programme.desc: This paranormal reality series follows explorer and ghost hunter Dakota Laden who partners up his sister Chelsea and best friend Tanner, to travel across the country in an RV and visit the most haunted locations in America -dark corridors of Brushy Mountain State Penitentiary, notorious Eloise Psychiatric Hospital, terrifying St. Albans Sanatorium and many more, as they learn the blood-chilling stories behind this scary places and face their darkest fears.

programme.title: Destination Fear
programme.desc: This paranormal reality series follows explorer and ghost hunter Dakota Laden who partners up his sister Chelsea and best friend Tanner, to travel across the country in an RV and visit the most haunted locations in America -dark corridors of Brushy Mountain State Penitentiary, notorious Eloise Psychiatric Hospital, terrifying St. Albans Sanatorium and many more, as they learn the blood-chilling stories behind this scary places and face their darkest fears.

Using state-of-the-art technology, strict methodology and local contacts, the team tracks down the source of the unexplained phenomena and cracks each outrageous case.

programme.title: Southern Fried Homicide
programme.desc: Things go south for some certain individuals in this 10-part series about drama, deceit... and murder. The lavish Southern subculture of deluxe drawls and charming characters is violently juxtaposed by a darkness under the surface. This series features re-enactments of sadistic crimes committed by those you wouldnt expect, highly regarded families with reputations and values to uphold, throwing that all away in a moment of passionate hatred.

programme.title: Southern Fried Homicide
programme.desc: Things go south for some certain individuals in this 10-part series about drama, deceit... and murder. The lavish Southern subculture of deluxe drawls and charming characters is violently juxtaposed by a darkness under the surface. This series features re-enactments of sadistic crimes committed by those you wouldnt expect, highly regarded families with reputations and values to uphold, throwing that all away in a moment of passionate hatred.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: Documentary series that tells true and often tragic stories of the crimes perpetrated on the internet and of deception and manipulation triggered by online interactions - from predators lurking behind Facebook profiles to maniacs searching for their victims in chat rooms. Series includes re-enactments, comments from law enforcement personnel, true-crime experts, psychologists and interviews from friends and families of the victims. Rare episodes feature victims who were extremely lucky to survive and are able to tell us what happened.

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: A true-life crime documentary series that blends dramatic re-enactments with interviews from family and friends of the crime victims along with commentary from law enforcment officers, legal professionals and criminal psychologists. Each 60 minute episode features a specific case where the darkest fears of victims become harrowing realities. Epsiodes include such tales as when Matthew Heikkila shoots his parents and then terrorizes his girlfriend; when a flight attendant breaks her own rule of traveling alone just once and pays the ultimate price; when 22-year-old college student Kari Swensen goes for a run in the Montana wilderness and is taken prisoner by two mountain men; and when recently divorced Tanya Petro goes missing after meeting a new man.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: A true-life crime documentary series that blends dramatic re-enactments with interviews from family and friends of the crime victims along with commentary from law enforcment officers, legal professionals and criminal psychologists. Each 60 minute episode features a specific case where the darkest fears of victims become harrowing realities. Epsiodes include such tales as when Matthew Heikkila shoots his parents and then terrorizes his girlfriend; when a flight attendant breaks her own rule of traveling alone just once and pays the ultimate price; when 22-year-old college student Kari Swensen goes for a run in the Montana wilderness and is taken prisoner by two mountain men; and when recently divorced Tanya Petro goes missing after meeting a new man.

programme.title: The Vanishing Women
programme.desc: Six women from the town of Chillicothe in Ohio have been missing or found dead since 2014. This true-crime series follows the law enforcement as they investigate the cases, and try to discover the truth and stop the possible serial killer.

programme.title: The Vanishing Women
programme.desc: Six women from the town of Chillicothe in Ohio have been missing or found dead since 2014. This true-crime series follows the law enforcement as they investigate the cases, and try to discover the truth and stop the possible serial killer.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programme.desc: No matter how far you run, or how much time passes, you cant escape your past. And for those who shared a life with an individual who became a killer, the past will always weigh heavy on their mind. This true-crime documentary series interviews loved ones of murderers to understand the impact and emotional turmoil that lingers over their life. In one act of violence, their lives would be changed forever.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programme.desc: No matter how far you run, or how much time passes, you cant escape your past. And for those who shared a life with an individual who became a killer, the past will always weigh heavy on their mind. This true-crime documentary series interviews loved ones of murderers to understand the impact and emotional turmoil that lingers over their life. In one act of violence, their lives would be changed forever.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Crime documentary series that examines homicide investigations using unfiltered footage, including body-cam, surveillance and interrogation-room footage, giving viewers a chance to follow a case from beginning to end. The series will give viewers a chance to experience how homicide cases are conducted, from the initial crime scene investigations by body cam, to home security tapes, to interrogation room footage of real confessions. Real tapes of the investigations will be combined with interviews with friends, family members, and law enforcement directly involved in the case.

programme.title: Теория больших денег
programme.desc: Гений математики Михаил Нефедов преподает в университете теорию вероятности и математическую статистику. Он помнит все, что когда-либо слышал, видел или читал. Михаил узнаёт, что у его сына-подростка опасное генетическое заболевание, лечение которого потребует многомиллионной суммы. Продав квартиру, Нефедов делает идеально просчитанную ставку на матч местной футбольной лиги, но проигрывает. Ошибиться он не мог, а значит, в уравнении есть неучтенная переменная. И это — подпольный букмекерский бизнес, где результаты игр подтасовываются для извлечения нелегального дохода. Михаил вычисляет организаторов теневого бизнеса и требует у них свой выигрыш. Так начинается война университетского преподавателя с букмекерской мафией.

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: "Неизвестная Россия" - авторский проект Вадима Кондакова. Это получасовые документальные истории о местах и людях, о которых мало кто знает. И которые станут для зрителя настоящим открытием. Автор побывал в самой самой западной точке страны, в Калининграде, где люди, без света и воды, живут в казематах заброшенного немецкого форта XIX века. И на далеких Курильских островах, в городе-призраке, про жителей которых почему-то забыли на материке. Кроме того, "Неизвестная Россия" расскажет о том, что за таинственный сигнал из космоса поймали в астрофизической обсерватории Нижнего Архыза. И можно ли стать дорожным полицейским, если ты родился в городе дальнобойщиков. В общем, "Неизвестная Россия" показывает страну такой, какой ее не знают даже сами россияне.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Мелодия на два голоса
programme.desc: Ирина и Сергей знакомятся друг с другом не в лучший для них обоих день: их встреча происходит в загсе, где они оба оформляют развод со своими вторыми половинами... Ирина - дочь успешного и известного в городе бизнесмена Романа Алексеевича Кудряшова. Привыкшая к роскоши и достатку, она остаётся доброй и скромной девушкой. После окончания института Ирина выбирает для себя нелегкую работу врача-акушера в роддоме. Сергей - парень из обычной интеллигентной семьи. Своей головой и своим трудом он добился хорошего образования и интересной работы. Любовь, захлестнувшая Ирину и Сергея, даёт им обоим надежду на счастье. Они решают быть вместе, и им не терпится познакомить друг с другом своих родителей. Но неожиданно для молодых это знакомство оборачивается катастрофой...

programme.title: Мелодия на два голоса
programme.desc: Ирина и Сергей знакомятся друг с другом не в лучший для них обоих день: их встреча происходит в загсе, где они оба оформляют развод со своими вторыми половинами...
